document_data.caption: A map showing Sarha Isle off the coast of southwest Afyal.
document_data.name: Sarha Isle
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarha Isle''' was a small island found just off the southwest shore of [[Afyal]] in the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region in [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: The island was located just {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}} offshore from the mainland of Afyal. It was also {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}} due east of the [[Horn of Sahu]], and {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} northeast from the mainland of [[Sahu]].
document_data.Activities: Afyal kept soldiers stationed in a ''[[Midani dictionary|qal'at]]'' on the north side of Sarha Isle, perhaps to keep a close watch on Sahu.
